mql_tools.configuration.Include4Dir.desc: Path to the "Include" folder: MQL4 (not necessarily)
mql_tools.configuration.Include5Dir.desc: Path to the "Include" folder: MQL5 (not necessarily)
mql_tools.configuration.Portable4.descri: Enable portable mode for MetaTrader 4 (uses /portable switch)
mql_tools.configuration.Portable5.descri: Enable portable mode for MetaTrader 5 (uses /portable switch)
mql_tools.configuration.Wine.Enabled.des: Enable Wine wrapper for running MetaEditor on macOS/Linux. When enabled, MetaEditor is executed via Wine and paths are converted using winepath.
mql_tools.configuration.Wine.Binary.desc: Path to the Wine binary (e.g., 'wine64', 'wine', or full path like '/usr/local/bin/wine64').

mql_tools.commands.Showfiles.title: Show/hide ex4/ex5 files
